original_title: Akira Mizuta Lippit on The Naked Island
overview: A interview with film scholar Akira Mizuta Lippit, who discusses Japanese cinema, its filmmakers, and the social and political climate of this time period for film. Akira also talks about the production history of 'The Naked Island', as well as the life and career of Shindo.
title: Akira Mizuta Lippit on The Naked Island
